name: DEMONIAC WORDS
description:
Clione is a young girl with a mysterious source. Demoniac Words is the incarnation of language, which is embodied as a witch with magic in the real world. She is looking for Clione for her own special purpose.



This production can only adopt simple technology, 3D characters and scenes to express and promote the plot due to the limitation of development budget.

While watching the plot, users must constantly answer multiple-choice English questions interspersed among them. The questions are so simple that users who even do not know English at all can definitely answer the questions and improve their knowledge of English.

DEMONIAC WORDS does not want to see users get stuck in the content and wants them to enjoy all the content smoothly. That's why only a single line of plot is used and made into a simple answer mode that users can try and error infinitely.

I don't want users to get tired of playing, but still be able to memorize the various types of knowledge provided by DEMONIAC WORDS repeatedly in an entertaining and adventurous atmosphere. It will be the purpose that DEMONIAC WORDS insists on.
